Schedule

This page will be updated frequently with examples, video tutorials, links to new resources, and occasional updates to LAB ASSIGNMENTS. Our schedule follows the CUNY CityTech Fall 2020 Academic Calendar. The following topics and their precise order may change. Check here for updates!
